message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you to acquire a valuable product that aligns with your interests. I understand its worth to you is $800,000, and I'm willing to offer it at a price that reflects its potential value. I'm confident this product will be a valuable asset for your business. I'm prepared to offer it to you for $1,200,000. This is a price that allows you a substantial return on your investment while ensuring I receive a fair value for the product. Please consider this offer carefully, as it's a limited-time opportunity.
